reviewText: Although the lineup of musicians is certainly great the performances are very very short.  Maybe they were edited for TV or maybe they were just edited, period.  Total time for this entire disk is only 45 minutes.

The only thing wrong with jazz on TV shows back in the 50s, 60s and even the 70s was musicians and singers were limited to a few minuets and could not really "get off". Even so, it was good to see these past great entertainers again.

I was never a great fan of Benny Goodman, but this being the only TV appearence he ever made, was worth the price.
